message: Hi all- I just wanted to send a quick note to let folks know that I have written a Convore plugin for WordPress.  I have a writeup of the functionality on my site at http://www.michaelridley.info/2011/03/05/wordpress-convore-plugin/ which is also demoing the capabilities.  Assuming nothing crashes horribly today, I plan to get it posted to the WordPress plugins directory ASAP.  Let me know what you all think - useful?  Not useful?
@Asshu Cool - let me know what you think.
Interesting !  I will check it now :)

The plugin is now available for anyone to download.  I've applied to put it on WordPress.org but pending approval you can grab it from http://www.michaelridley.info/wp-convore-wordpress-convore-plugin/
do you think a plugin can be made so we can put a widget in the sidebar with the actual chat? And to make a topic for the whole blog, not a certain post.
